metadata.title: Easy Resume Builder - Professional Resume Tool
metadata.description: Create professional resumes with ease. Smart templates optimized for tech industry, with quick PDF export. Perfect for developers, product managers, and tech professionals.
metadata.keywords: easy resume builder,tech resume,developer resume,product manager resume,resume maker,quick resume,professional resume
metadata.author: devxiyang
metadata.ogTitle: Resume Builder - Create Professional Resumes Easily
metadata.ogDescription: Create professional resumes in minutes. Smart templates and easy editing, perfect for showcasing your skills and experience.
metadata.twitterTitle: Resume Builder - Create Professional Resumes Easily
metadata.twitterDescription: Create professional resumes in minutes. Smart templates and easy editing, perfect for showcasing your skills and experience.

import.title: Import Resume Data
import.description: This will import a previously saved resume data file. Current data will be overwritten.

save.title: Save Resume Data
save.description: This will save your current resume data as a JSON file. You can choose where to save it.

download.title: Download Resume PDF
download.description: This will download the current version of your resume in PDF format, perfect for job applications.

mobileNotice.title: Desktop Experience Recommended
mobileNotice.description: For the best resume editing experience, please use a desktop device

templates.title: Professional Resume Templates
templates.subtitle: Carefully designed templates to showcase your professional skills and project experience.

cta.title: Ready to Create Your Professional Resume?
cta.description: Choose your favorite template and start building your resume now.

modern.name: Modern Resume Template
modern.description: Modern design highlighting tech stack and project experience, perfect for showcasing your professional expertise.
modern.bestFor: Full Stack Engineers, Frontend Developers, Backend Developers

professional.name: Professional Resume Template
professional.description: Professional template design balancing technical details and management experience.

fresh.name: Innovative Resume Template
fresh.description: Creative design that gives your technical resume personality.
fresh.bestFor: Product Engineers, R&D Engineers, Data Engineers

clean.name: Minimalist Resume Template
clean.description: Minimalist design making technical abilities clear and intuitive.
clean.bestFor: Algorithm Engineers, Data Scientists, Research Engineers

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Delete
confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

cta.title: Create Your Professional Resume
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals using our simple yet powerful resume builder. Easily showcase your skills, experience, and achievements.

hero.title: Build Your Professional Resume
hero.description: Simple and intuitive resume builder with smart templates. Easily showcase your skills and experience, perfect for tech professionals.

showcase.title: Simple Yet Powerful Resume Builder
showcase.description: Create impressive resumes without the hassle. Perfect for tech professionals and beyond.

builder.title: Smart Resume Creation
builder.description: Intuitive editor with smart layouts. Easily organize your experience and skills to stand out.

template.title: Ready-to-use Templates
template.description: Professionally designed templates optimized for tech industry and beyond.

description.modern: Clean, professional templates that make resume creation a breeze.
description.customization: Simple editor for quick updates to your skills and experience.
description.download: One-click PDF export, ready when you are.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us
whyChoose.subtitle: Making professional resume creation simple and fast, with templates optimized for tech industry.
